item.cobblemon.galarica_cuff: Cuff o' th' land o' dark
item.cobblemon.galarica_wreath: Wreath o' th' land o' dark
item.cobblemon.white_mint_leaf.tooltip: Influences ya monster's values to floorboard
item.cobblemon.great_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch
item.cobblemon.safari_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch, only when non-combatting
item.cobblemon.fast_ball.tooltip: Four lots th' rate o' catch if th' monster be faster than a hundred points
item.cobblemon.level_ball.tooltip: Up to four times th' rate o' catch, depending how strong ye monster is compared to ye opponent
item.cobblemon.lure_ball.tooltip: Four lots th' rate o' catch on reel'd in monsters
item.cobblemon.heavy_ball.tooltip: Dependin' on weight, could be from standard or four lots th' rate o' catch
item.cobblemon.love_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er double if yer monster be th' opposite gender, eight lots th' rate o' catch if also th' same kind o' monster
item.cobblemon.friend_ball.tooltip: Standard rate o' catch, but boon of 150 allyship
item.cobblemon.moon_ball.tooltip: From standard to four lots th' rate o' catch, dependin' on how much moonlight th're be
item.cobblemon.sport_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch
item.cobblemon.net_ball.tooltip: Triple th' standard rate o' catch on ocean and critter types
item.cobblemon.dive_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er triple th' standard rate o' catch on those bathin'
item.cobblemon.nest_ball.tooltip: Better rate o' catch on those under 30, up to four lots th' rate o' catch
item.cobblemon.repeat_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er triple th' standard rate o' catch on monsters caught before
item.cobblemon.timer_ball.tooltip: Rate o' catch increases from standard to four lots th' longer th' fight lasts, up to th' tenth round
item.cobblemon.luxury_ball.tooltip: Standard rate o' catch, but boon of double allyship growth
item.cobblemon.dusk_ball.tooltip: Three lots th' rate o' catch in th' darkness, bit o'er standard in th' dim
item.cobblemon.heal_ball.tooltip: Standard rate o' catch, but restores monster to battle ready on catch
item.cobblemon.quick_ball.tooltip: Five lots th' rate o' catch, only right on th' start o' battle
item.cobblemon.park_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er double th' rate o' catch in forests 'n' plains
item.cobblemon.dream_ball.tooltip: Four lots th' rate o' catch on napping monsters
item.cobblemon.beast_ball.tooltip: Five lots th' rate o' catch on beings from th' fourth seas, oth'rwise a tenth
item.cobblemon.ancient_great_ball.toolti: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch
item.cobblemon.ancient_feather_ball.tool: Standard rate o' catch, soars through th' skies
item.cobblemon.ancient_wing_ball.tooltip: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch, soars through th' skies
item.cobblemon.ancient_jet_ball.tooltip: Doubled rate o' catch, soars through th' skies
item.cobblemon.ancient_heavy_ball.toolti: Standard rate o' catch, sinks quick through th' skies
item.cobblemon.ancient_leaden_ball.toolt: Bit o'er standard rate o' catch, sinks quick through th' skies
item.cobblemon.ancient_gigaton_ball.tool: Doubled rate o' catch, sinks quick through th' skies
block.cobblemon.small_budding_sky_tumble: Small bud o' heaven tumbl'd rocks
block.cobblemon.medium_budding_sky_tumbl: Sizable bud o' heaven tumbl'd rocks
block.cobblemon.large_budding_sky_tumble: Huge bud o' heaven tumbl'd rocks
block.cobblemon.small_budding_black_tumb: Small bud o' black tumbl'd rocks
block.cobblemon.medium_budding_black_tum: Sizable bud o' black tumbl'd rocks
block.cobblemon.large_budding_black_tumb: Huge bud o' black tumbl'd rocks
cobblemon.overflow_no_pc: Ye crew be full, with nowhere ta' go!
cobblemon.overflow_no_space: Ye crew be full, 'nd so be %1$s!
cobblemon.overflow_to_pc: Ye crew be full! %1$s be stowed away in %2$s.
cobblemon.command.clearparty.nonethere: There be no monsters in %1$s's crew.

cobblemon.ui.summary.title: Breakdown
cobblemon.ui.starter.title: First mate picker
cobblemon.ui.starter.alreadyselected: Ye already have a first mate!
cobblemon.ui.starter.cannotchoose: Ye cannot get a first mate now.
cobblemon.ui.starter.hasalreadychosen: %1$s has already picked a first mate.
cobblemon.ui.starter.skippedchoosing: Ye have not yet selected a first mate, but have already gotten a monster. To pick a first mate, place all yer monsters in a box o' monsters, then press "%1$s".
cobblemon.ui.starter.chooseyourstarter: Press %1$s to pick a first mate 'nd adventure!
cobblemon.trade.request_expired: Th' request to trade crewmates w'th %1$s be unwelcomed.
cobblemon.trade.request_already_expired: Their crew trade request be expired already.
cobblemon.trade.offer: %1$s offer'd to trade crewmates with ye.
cobblemon.ui.pc.box.title: Box o' mates %1$s
cobblemon.pasture.too_many_nearby: There be too many monster's nearby.
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyinuse: This tray be occupied by anoth'r sailor!
cobblemon.healingmachine.nopokemon: Ye don't have a crew ta' heal!
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyhealed: Ye crew is already perfectly healthy!
cobblemon.healingmachine.notenoughcharge: This bed needs %s more charge to heal ye crew!
cobblemon.healingmachine.inbattle: Ye shan't restore ye crew while in combat!
cobblemon.healingmachine.alreadyhealing: Ye crew already be in a tray!
cobblemon.pc.inbattle: Ye shan't change out ya crew while in combat!
cobblemon.battle.ui.forfeit_confirmation: Forfeiting ends ye with a loss, matey. Ye certain?
cobblemon.battle.ui.actions_label: Ye need ta' choose an action, so press %1$s.
cobblemon.drop.item.full: Ya loot bag be full, so th' %1$s fell out.
item.cobblemon.aguav_berry.tooltip: Restores a third o' a monster's health, confuses those with lower'd Res, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.apicot_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Res by a stage, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.babiri_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Metal attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.charti_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Stone attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.chople_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Attacker attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.coba_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Soarer attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.colbur_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Demon attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.custap_berry.tooltip: Eater swiftly moves, at quarter health
item.cobblemon.enigma_berry.tooltip: Eater restores quarter health if hit with a weakness
item.cobblemon.figy_berry.tooltip: Restores a third o' a monster's health, confuses those with lower'd Power, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.ganlon_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Strength by a stage, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.haban_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Drake attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.hopo_berry.tooltip: Restores 10 pp to a skill when fed t' a monster
item.cobblemon.iapapa_berry.tooltip: Restores a third o' a monster's health, confuses those with lower'd Strength, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.jaboca_berry.tooltip: Eater does an eighth damage to th' creature who last hit it
item.cobblemon.kasib_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Spirit attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.kebia_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Toxin attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.kee_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Strength by a stage, when melee'd
item.cobblemon.lansat_berry.tooltip: Eater gains energy o' focus at quarter health
item.cobblemon.leppa_berry.tooltip: Restores 10 pp to a skill when it hits 0
item.cobblemon.liechi_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Power by a stage, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.mago_berry.tooltip: Restores a third o' a monster's health, confuses those with lower'd Speed, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.maranga_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Res by a stage, when magically attack'd
item.cobblemon.micle_berry.tooltip: Eater gains a 1.2x accuracy, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.occa_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Flame attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.oran_berry.tooltip: Heals 10 health, eaten under half health
item.cobblemon.passho_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Ocean attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.payapa_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Mental attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.petaya_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Magic by a stage, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.rindo_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Plant attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.roseli_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Fae attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.rowap_berry.tooltip: Eater does an eighth damage to th' creature who last cast on it
item.cobblemon.salac_berry.tooltip: Raises eater's Speed by a stage, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.shuca_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Land attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.sitrus_berry.tooltip: Heals quarter health, eaten under half health
item.cobblemon.starf_berry.tooltip: Raises stat harshly at quarter health
item.cobblemon.tanga_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Critter attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.wacan_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Thund'r attacks take less damage
item.cobblemon.wiki_berry.tooltip: Restores a third o' a monster's health, confuses those with lower'd Magic, eaten at quarter health
item.cobblemon.yache_berry.tooltip: Those weak to Frozen attacks take less damage
cobblemon.command.general.invalid-party-: There be no monster in slot %1$s!
cobblemon.command.givepokemon.nospecies: Arr, ye need to include a monster's name or 'random'
cobblemon.command.spawnpokemon.nospecies: Arr, ye need to include a monster's name or 'random'
cobblemon.command.pokeheal.in_battle: Ye cannot heal yer crew while in combat!
cobblemon.command.pokebox.box_does_not_e: That captain don't have a box %1$s.
cobblemon.command.pokebox.box_is_full: That captain's box %1$s already be at capacity.
cobblemon.command.pokebox.last_pokemon: That captain's last monster wasn't shipped ta' th' box o' monsters.
advancements.cobblemon.root.description: Pick a first mate, 'nd set sail!
Keep th' scurvy's cure core as a scrap o' apple
advancements.cobblemon.any_plant.descrip: Get a landlubber's green thumb on!
advancements.cobblemon.harvest_apricorn: Be it a Fruit or a Nut?
Right-click to harvest a fully-grown fruitnut
advancements.cobblemon.harvest_apricorn_: Fruitnuts can release their seed. Plant that meager shrub to get more
advancements.cobblemon.bone_meal_apricor: Use bone meal to accelerate fruitnut growth
advancements.cobblemon.rainbow_apricorns: Plant a fruitnut tree o' every color
advancements.cobblemon.craft_poke_ball.d: Using four of th' same fruitnut 'nd a bullion o' copper, craft yer first monster capturer
Craft th' seven base monster capturers
advancements.cobblemon.craft_apricorn_ba: Craft th' seven balls o' Kurt
advancements.cobblemon.craft_all_balls.d: Craft one of every monster capturer ye can
advancements.cobblemon.first_catch.descr: Use a monster capturer 'nd catch a monster
advancements.cobblemon.full_party.descri: Fill yer active crew with monsters
advancements.cobblemon.first_evolution.d: Transmogrify a monster from their breakdown page
advancements.cobblemon.first_battle_vict: Combat another captain 'nd be th' victor
advancements.cobblemon.healing_machine.d: Wait around for a bed o' science to have enough magic to heal yer crew
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_leek.descr: Collect a medicinal leek, a crop that grows on th' waters
advancements.cobblemon.medicinal_brew.de: Brew a brew o' potions outta a medicinal leek
advancements.cobblemon.brew_potion.descr: Use an oran berry to brew a brew o' healing out o' a brew o' potions
advancements.cobblemon.brew_full_restore: Brew potions stronger, until ye get a restoration brew from a full brew o' creature healin' and a lum berry
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_mint.descr: Find a mint o' nature, some leaves that grow on th' grass o' mountains
Gather all six types o' leaves o' mint
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_revival_he: Find a herb o' resurrection, a crop growing in th' moldy caves
advancements.cobblemon.use_revive.descri: Use any form o' th' resurrection crops to bring a monster back to life
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_big_root.d: Find a healthy root, growing under th' surface
advancements.cobblemon.craft_remedy.desc: Create a remedy, a solid form o' healing for th' early days
Get some seeds o' vivichokity, a scarce 'nd rare treasure
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_berry.desc: Find a berry, a set o' crops with many a use
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_mutated_be: Plant some berry trees together, 'nd let 'em mingle
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_all_berrie: Obtain all o' th' berry species
advancements.cobblemon.use_pasture.descr: Craft a block o' crew deck, 'nd let ye crew walk about
advancements.cobblemon.evolve_veevees.de: Transmogrify th' monster Cat o' nine 8 different ways
advancements.cobblemon.evolve_shedinja.d: Have a spare monster capturer on ye, and get th' husk Shedinja
advancements.cobblemon.trade_pokemon.des: Barter 'nd trade monsters with another captain
advancements.cobblemon.max_level_baby.de: Take a monster who never transmogrified, but could, all th' way t' level 100
advancements.cobblemon.use_candy.descrip: Use a candy o' experiences on a monster
advancements.cobblemon.own_zangoose_sevi: Force a Zangoose 'nd Seviper to fight for th' same crew
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_fossil.des: Unearth a fossil from ancient times
advancements.cobblemon.evolve_gholdengo_: Bury thee in th' treasure o' Davy Jones
Transmogrify a Gimmighoul into a Blackbeard's clobber-coated Gholdengo
advancements.cobblemon.resurrect_pokemon: Use a machine o' resurrection to bring a monster back from beyond death
advancements.cobblemon.obtain_tumbleston: Unearth a tumbl'd rock from a suspicious lookin' block
Place a tumbl'd rock near molten rock or Davy Jone's heat, 'nd make it expand o'er time
advancements.cobblemon.craft_ancient_bal: Use tumbl'd rocks to make th' fifteen tumbl'd balls
cobblemon.battle.crash: A battle error occurred. If on a lonely voyage, report this to th' dev crew. Otherwise, report this to yer server's crew.
cobblemon.battle.must_switch: Choose a monster to switch in
cobblemon.battle.throw_pokeball_prompt: Throw a ball at th' opponent to capture it.
cobblemon.battle.run_prompt: Run away from th' opposing monster to flee and end th' battle.
cobblemon.battle.superEffective: Sink me! Blow th' man down!
cobblemon.battle.clearallnegativeboost.z: %1$s's reduct've stat alterations be cleared, thanks to th' Z-Power!
cobblemon.battle.unboost.cap.multiple: %1$s's values be at Davy Jones' Locker.
cobblemon.battle.boost.severe.zeffect: %1$s increased %2$s full sail using th' Z-Power!
cobblemon.battle.setboost.bellydrum: %1$s cut its own life to maximise its power!
cobblemon.battle.setboost.angerpoint: %1$s has full power due to Anger point!
cobblemon.capture.not_your_turn: Wait for th' right time to act, scallywag.
cobblemon.capture.not_wild: That %1$s is not a wild monster.
cobblemon.capture.in_battle: That %1$s is in combat, so cannot be caught by ye.
cobblemon.capture.not_single: Ye can only capture wild monsters in a one on one duel.
cobblemon.you_in_battle: Ye can't do that while in combat!
cobblemon.battle.weather.snow.upkeep: Th' flakes o' snow fill th' air.
cobblemon.battle.start.imprison: %1$s block'd off skills th' target shares!
cobblemon.battle.start.snatch: %1$s bw waitin' for th' target ta' make a move!
cobblemon.battle.start.shedtail: %1$s shed tail ta' create a decoy!
cobblemon.battle.start.perish: %2$s rounds left 'til th' siren song claims %1$s.
cobblemon.battle.start.aquaring: %1$s be cloak'd in th' veiling waves!
cobblemon.battle.start.powershift: %1$s switch'd round offensive stats 'nd defensive stats!
cobblemon.battle.fieldstart.gravity: Everything be pulled t'wards th' ground!
cobblemon.battle.fieldstart.magicroom: Th' field forces loot to stop workin'!
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.electricterrai: Th' charge disappeared from th' battlefield.
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.grassyterrain: Th' moss disappeared from th' battlefield.
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.magicroom: Magic room wore off, an' held items' effects be back to normal!
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.mistyterrain: Th' mist disappeared from th' battlefield.
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.mudsport: Th' effects of mud sport have faded.
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.psychicterrain: Th' weirdness disappeared from th' battlefield!
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.trickroom: Th' twist'd dimensions returned to normal!
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.watersport: Th' effects of water sport have faded.
cobblemon.battle.fieldend.wonderroom: Wonder room wore off, 'nd strength and resilience returned to normal!
cobblemon.battle.fieldactivate.perishson: All monsters tha' heard th' siren song will fall in three rounds!
cobblemon.battle.fieldactivate.fairylock: No chances ta' flee next round!
cobblemon.battle.fieldactivate.teatime: Slice the mainbrace! E'eryone dug int' their berries!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.stealthrock: Sharp stones be scattered o'er %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.spikes: Spike traps be scattered across %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.toxicspikes: Tainted spike traps be scattered across %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.reflect: Th' reflector wall makes %1$s crew strong 'gainst power attacks!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.lightscreen: Th' screen o' light makes %1$s crew resistant ta' magic!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.auroraveil: Th' veil o' aurora makes %1$s crew strong 'n' resiliant 'gainst all foe attacks!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.tailwind: %1$s crew's sails be full o' wind!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.safeguard: %1$s's crew be cloaked in a mystic'l veil!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.luckychant: Th' chant o' luck prev'nts critical blows against %1$s crew!
cobblemon.battle.sidestart.mist: %1$s crew be shroud'd in th' mists!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.stealthrock: Th' sharp stones be swept off %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.spikes: Th' spike traps be swept off %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.toxicspikes: Th' tainted spike traps be swept off %1$s deck!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.stickyweb: Th' cobwebs be swept off %1$s deck
cobblemon.battle.sideend.lightscreen: %1$s crew's screen o' light rotted out!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.auroraveil: %1$s crew's veil set o'er the horizon!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.luckychant: %1$s crew's chant o' luck rotted out!
cobblemon.battle.sideend.mist: %1$s's crew be out o' th' mists!
cobblemon.battle.cant.attract: %1$s be stilled by affections of th' heart!
cobblemon.battle.cant.healblock: %1$s can't use %2$s because o' th' healin' blockade!
cobblemon.battle.cant.taunt: %1$s be taunted by th' enemy, no time to use %2$s!
cobblemon.battle.cant.throatchop: Th' throat chop be preventin' %1$s from vocalizin'!
cobblemon.battle.activate.happyhour: Yo ho ho, th' scallywags be chanteyin'!
cobblemon.battle.activate.powersplit: %1$s shared their pow'r with th' target!
cobblemon.battle.activate.gravity: %1$s couldn't stay airborne because o' th' grav'ty!
cobblemon.battle.activate.trapped: %1$s be trapped, no chance of fleeing!
cobblemon.battle.activate.sandtomb: %1$s be caught in th' flowin' sands!
cobblemon.battle.activate.courtchange: %1$s swapped th' battle effects affecting each side o' th' field!
cobblemon.battle.activate.guardsplit: %1$s shared their guard with th' target!
cobblemon.battle.activate.destinybond: %1$s dragged th' foe down to Davy Jones with 'em!
cobblemon.battle.activate.firespin: %1$s be caught in th' raging fire!
cobblemon.battle.activate.quickclaw: %1$s be able to break away 'nd act, thanks to th' sneaky swift claw!
cobblemon.battle.activate.focusband: %1$s be hung standin' thanks ta' th' %2$s!
cobblemon.battle.activate.disguise: It's disguise was a good decoy!
cobblemon.battle.activate.whirlpool: %1$s be caught in th' raging waves!
cobblemon.battle.activate.substitute: Th' decoy be damag'd instead o' %1$s!
cobblemon.battle.activate.matblock: %3$s be block'd by the rais'd plank!
cobblemon.battle.activate.powder: When th' flames hit th' powder on th' monster, it explod'd!
cobblemon.battle.activate.quickguard: %1$s be protected by their hasty guard
cobblemon.battle.activate.grudge: %1$s's %3$s be outta pp due to th' grudge!
cobblemon.battle.activate.wideguard: %1$s be protected by their wide guard!
cobblemon.battle.activate.craftyshield: %1$s be protected by their crafty shields!
cobblemon.battle.prepare.dig: %1$s burrowed its way under th' ground!
cobblemon.battle.prepare.freezeshock: %1$s be cloaked in frozen sparkin' light!
cobblemon.battle.prepare.iceburn: %1$s be cloaked in frozen burnin' air!
cobblemon.battle.prepare.skyattack: %1$s be glowin' with a harsh light!
cobblemon.battle.prepare.skydrop: %1$s took its target into th' sky!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.guardswap: %1$s switch'd all alterations to its strength 'nd resilience with th' target!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.powerswap: %1$s switch'd all alterations to its power 'nd magic with th' target!
cobblemon.battle.swapboost.heartswap: %1$s swapped stat alterations with th' target!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.snatch: %1$s be watching for a foe tryin' ta' improve!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.quickguard: %1$s's crew be protected by their hasty guard!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.wideguard: %1$s's crew be protected by th' wide defenses!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.roost: (%1$s no longer be a soarer for the round.)
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.matblock: %1$s plans ta' flip up a floorboard to block attacks!
cobblemon.battle.singleturn.magiccoat: %1$s shrouded itself in a magic coat!
cobblemon.battle.singlemove.destinybond: %1$s plans to go ta' Davy Jones with th' foe in tow!
cobblemon.battle.singlemove.grudge: %1$s sets up th' foe to hold a grudge!
cobblemon.battle.damage.confusion: %1$s hit itself, th' darn thing's confused!
cobblemon.battle.damage.leechseed: %1$s's health be sapped by leeching seeds!
cobblemon.battle.damage.saltcure: %1$s be hurt by th' curing salts!
cobblemon.battle.damage.magmastorm: %1$s be hurt by th' flamin' rocks!
cobblemon.battle.damage.spikes: %1$s be stabbed by th' spike traps!
cobblemon.battle.damage.firespin: %1$s be hurt by th' spinnin' flames!
cobblemon.battle.damage.mindblown: %1$s sacrificed health to pow'r up th' action!
cobblemon.battle.damage.dryskin: %1$s be hurt by th' dry skin!
cobblemon.battle.end.leechseed: Th' seeds leechin' off %1$s died off!
cobblemon.battle.end.powershift: %1$s switch'd round offensive stats 'nd defensive stats!
cobblemon.battle.end.protosynthesis: Th' boons of %1$s's protosynthesis ran dry!
cobblemon.battle.end.firespin: Th' raging fire trapping %1$s died out!
cobblemon.battle.end.telekinesis: %1$s be freed from th' floatin' magics!
cobblemon.battle.end.futuresight: %1$s was hit by th' predict'd attack!
cobblemon.battle.fail.frz: %1$s be a crystal o' ice already!
cobblemon.battle.fail.uproar: %1$s can't hit th' caulk during a roarin' time like these!
cobblemon.battle.fail.skydrop: %1$s be too weighty to be skyborne!
cobblemon.battle.fail.grassknot: %1$s shook heads. Can't perform this action, it seems...
cobblemon.battle.ability.unnerve: %1$s made th' opponent too nervous ta' snack!
cobblemon.battle.error.no_pokemon: Ye don't have any usable monsters!

cobblemon.config.ui.default_drop_item_me: Drops th' loot on the entity that is dying, if it exists. If not, drops at th' position parsed into drops.
Puts th' loot in the captain's loot bag or drops it on th' ground if th' loot bag is full. If th' captain that caused th' drop doesn't exist, it drops at th' position parsed into drops.
cobblemon.config.ui.drops_after_death_an: Whether monsters drop loot 'nd Minecraft XP after their death animations are finished playing, or instantly upon death like vanilla mobs.
cobblemon.config.ui.pokemon_save_interva: Seconds between saving storage data to file. eg crew & box data.
cobblemon.config.ui.default_box_count.to: The number of boxes available in th' box o' monsters.

cobblemon.config.ui.storage_format.toolt: The storage format used for storing cobblemon data. (nbt/json/mongodb)
cobblemon.config.ui.minimum_level_range_: The value considered to be th' highest crew monster level when a captain's crew is empty or extremely low level. Th' higher this value, th' higher th' levels of monsters can be around captains with no or very weak monsters.
block.cobblemon.polished_sky_tumblestone: Slab o' good lookin' heaven tumbl'd rocks
cobblemon.config.ui.minimum_spawning_zon: Minimum spawning zone distance from captain
cobblemon.config.ui.maximum_spawning_zon: Maximum spawning zone distance from captain
cobblemon.config.ui.export_starter_confi: Whether t' generate starter.json for editing th' first mate list.
cobblemon.config.ui.seconds_to_charge_he: Seconds to fully pow'r a bed o' science
The amount of seconds that takes for a bed o' science to fully pow'r.
How many seconds before reviving a fainted monster.
cobblemon.config.ui.minimum_spawning_zon: Minimum amount of blocks from th' captain that monsters can spawn.
cobblemon.config.ui.maximum_spawning_zon: Maximum amount of blocks from th' captain that monsters can spawn.
cobblemon.config.ui.display_entity_level: Whether t' display th' level above a monster.
cobblemon.config.ui.display_entity_name_: Whether t' display th' name above a monster.
cobblemon.config.ui.display_name_for_unk: Whether t' display th' name above a monster if it has not been scanned with th' index o' monsters yet.
cobblemon.config.ui.display_entity_label: Display entity labels when crouching only
cobblemon.config.ui.shiny_rate.tooltip: The chance for a spawned monster to be shiny. If 0 no spawned monster will be shiny. Calculated as 1/x.
cobblemon.config.ui.shiny_notice_particl: The distance at which shiny particles for monsters will start appearing.
cobblemon.config.ui.player_damage_pokemo: Whether captains can attack monsters like normal Minecraft entities.
cobblemon.config.ui.pasture_max_per_chun: Block o' crew deck max per chunk
The maximum number of crew deck'd monsters that can be sent out in a chunk.
cobblemon.config.ui.battle_pvp_max_dista: The maximum distance at which pvp battles can occur.
cobblemon.config.ui.trade_max_distance.t: The maximum distance at which barters are allowed.
cobblemon.config.ui.max_inserted_fossil_: Th' maximum amount of fossils that can be added t' th' studier o' th' fossils.

Whether t' hide unimplemented monsters from th' index o' monsters.
cobblemon.config.ui.summary_pokemon_foll: Whether or not monsters should follow th' mouse cursor with their heads in th' breakdown screen.
cobblemon.config.ui.max_pokedex_scanning: Th' maximum distance at which th' index o' monsters can detect 'nd scan monsters.

cobblemon.config.ui.max_pokemon_level.to: Th' maximum level monsters can get t'.
cobblemon.config.ui.default_drop_item_me: Defines how loot be dropped (entity, captain, or loot bag).
Whether t' notify th' captain of dropped loot from defeating wild monsters.
cobblemon.config.ui.mongodb_connection_s: Th' database connection string for yer MongoDB database for Cobblemon data storage.
cobblemon.config.ui.prevent_complete_par: Whether t' prevent captains from depositing their last crew monster into th' box o' monsters.
cobblemon.config.ui.enable_spawning.tool: Whether t' allow monsters t' spawn.
cobblemon.config.ui.minimum_distance_bet: Th' minimum block distance between spawning monsters 'nd existing entities in th' world. This prevents clustered monster spawning.
cobblemon.config.ui.save_pokemon_to_worl: Whether t' save monsters to th' world so they exist after a chunk/world is reloaded.
cobblemon.config.ui.allow_experience_fro: Whether t' allow exp. gain from pvp battles.
cobblemon.config.ui.experience_share_mul: Multiplier of how much of th' total exp is given to a monster holding an exp. share.
cobblemon.config.ui.lucky_egg_multiplier: Multiplier of how much of th' total exp is given to a monster holding an egg o' luck.
cobblemon.config.ui.default_flee_distanc: How far away a captain must get t' flee a battle (non-pvp). If the value is -1, battles be unfleeable.
cobblemon.config.ui.experience_multiplie: Additional exp. multiplier for exp. calculation.
cobblemon.config.ui.pokemon_per_chunk.to: The amount of monsters allowed within a chunk when spawning.
cobblemon.config.ui.infinite_healer_char: Whether bed o' sciences have infinite pow'r t' heal monsters.
cobblemon.config.ui.max_healer_charge.to: The maximum amount of full health restoration bed o' science can have. 1 charge is equivalent to a candy o' total resurrection, plus pp restoration.
cobblemon.config.ui.faint_awaken_health_: How much health to restore when defaultFaintTimer is up.
cobblemon.config.ui.heal_percent.tooltip: How much health to restore when healTimer is up.
cobblemon.config.ui.heal_timer.tooltip: How many seconds between health naturally restoring.
cobblemon.config.ui.base_apricorn_tree_g: Multiplier on biome-based chance for fruitnut trees to spawn during world generation.
cobblemon.config.ui.display_entity_label: Whether t' display th' name above a monster only when crouching or at all times.
cobblemon.config.ui.apple_leftovers_chan: The chance to drop a scrap o' apple when a captain eats an item that has #cobblemon:held/leaves_leftovers.
cobblemon.config.ui.big_root_propagation: The chance that healthy roots will grow more roots where possible.
cobblemon.config.ui.energy_root_chance.t: The chance that a healthy root will grow a root o' energy.
cobblemon.config.ui.max_dynamax_level.to: The maximum kraken level monsters can be upgraded to.
cobblemon.config.ui.pasture_block_update: Block o' crew deck update ticks
The number of server ticks between block o' crew deck updates.
cobblemon.config.ui.pasture_max_wander_d: Block o' crew deck max wander distance
The maximum amount of blocks a monster can move from a block o' crew deck.
cobblemon.config.ui.default_pastured_pok: The maximum monsters that can be placed in a block o' crew deck.
cobblemon.battle.start.flashfire: The pow'r of %1$s's flame element actions rose!
cobblemon.battle.activate.custapberry: %1$s can act ahead o' time, thanks t' its custap berry!
item.cobblemon.link_cable.tooltip: Permits transmogrification o' monsters th't need t' be barter'd
item.cobblemon.electirizer.tooltip: Transmogrifies Electabuzz ta' Electivire if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.strawberry_sweet.tooltip: Transmogrifies Milcery ta' Alcremie wearin' a candy o' strawberry
item.cobblemon.love_sweet.tooltip: Transmogrifies Milcery ta' Alcremie wearin' a candy o' romance
item.cobblemon.ability_patch.tooltip: Unlocks th' hidden trait o' th' monster
item.cobblemon.sassy_mint.tooltip: Changes a monster's stats to match that o' a cheeky essence
item.cobblemon.cell_battery.tooltip_1: Increases th' wielder's power when hit by a thund'r element skill
item.cobblemon.covert_cloak.tooltip: Protects th' wielder from added effects o' a damaging skill
item.cobblemon.leftovers.tooltip: Restores th' health o' th' wielder gradually
item.cobblemon.resist_feather.tooltip: Raises a monster's strength evs by 1
item.cobblemon.eviolite.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's strength and resilience if it could transmogrify further
item.cobblemon.kings_rock.tooltip_1: If th' holdin' monster lands their shot, th' foe may flinch
item.cobblemon.prism_scale.tooltip: Transmogrifies Feebas ta' Milotic if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.hard_stone.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's stones element skills
item.cobblemon.clover_sweet.tooltip: Transmogrifies Milcery ta' Alcremie wearin' a candy o' luck
item.cobblemon.misty_seed.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's strength on fae island
item.cobblemon.dubious_disc.tooltip: Transmogrifies Porygon2 ta' Porygon-Z if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.masterpiece_teacup.toolti: Transmogrifies masterpiece Poltchageist ta' masterpiece Sinistcha
item.cobblemon.muscle_feather.tooltip: Raises a monster's power evs by 1
item.cobblemon.fairy_feather.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's fae element skills
item.cobblemon.miracle_seed.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's plant element skills
item.cobblemon.punching_glove.tooltip: Boosts th' damage o' th' wielder's punching skills, and makes 'em avoid contact effects
item.cobblemon.charcoal_stick.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's flame element skills
item.cobblemon.whipped_dream.tooltip: Transmogrifies Swirlix ta' Slurpuff if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.ability_shield.tooltip: Prev'nts the wielder's trait from bein' alter'd or disabl'd
item.cobblemon.air_balloon.tooltip_1: Lifts th' wielder off th' deck
item.cobblemon.assault_vest.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's resilience, but stops use o' effect skills
item.cobblemon.binding_band.tooltip: Increases damage from th' residual bindings
item.cobblemon.black_belt.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's attacker element skills
item.cobblemon.black_glasses.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's demon element skills
item.cobblemon.black_sludge.tooltip: If th' wielder be of th' toxin element, their health restores durin' combat. Damages those o' other elements
item.cobblemon.blunder_policy.tooltip_1: Increases th' wielder's speed if their shot misses
item.cobblemon.choice_band.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's power, but prevents tactic shifting
item.cobblemon.choice_specs.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's magic, but prevents tactic shifting
item.cobblemon.dragon_fang.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's drake element skills
item.cobblemon.eject_button.tooltip_1: Swaps th' holder out when hit by a damaging skill
item.cobblemon.eject_pack.tooltip_1: Swaps th' holder out if any stat drops
item.cobblemon.electric_seed.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's strength on charg'd island
item.cobblemon.exp_share.tooltip: Gives th' wielder a share o' experience from fights without joining th' fray
item.cobblemon.expert_belt.tooltip: Increases th' damage fr'm sinking skills
item.cobblemon.focus_band.tooltip: Lets th' wielder focus in, sometimes letting 'em endure th' blow
item.cobblemon.focus_sash.tooltip_1: Lets th' wielder focus in, letting 'em endure a single blow
item.cobblemon.heavy_duty_boots.tooltip: Prev'nts traps set on th' deck
item.cobblemon.iron_ball.tooltip: Th' wielder be weigh'd down to th' deck, and their speed halv'd
item.cobblemon.lucky_egg.tooltip: Improves th' count o' magic orbs gained by th' wielder
item.cobblemon.magnet.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's thund'r element skills
item.cobblemon.metronome.tooltip: Increases th' damage o' skills repeated
item.cobblemon.poison_barb.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's toxin element skills
item.cobblemon.protective_pads.tooltip: Protects th' wielder from contact effects
item.cobblemon.razor_claw.tooltip_1: Boosts th' critical chance for th' wielder
item.cobblemon.razor_claw.tooltip_2: Transmogrifies Sneasel ta' Sneasler or Weavile based on time o' day
item.cobblemon.razor_fang.tooltip_1: If th' holdin' monster lands their shot, th' foe may flinch
item.cobblemon.razor_fang.tooltip_2: Transmogrifies Gligar ta' Gliscor if held at night
item.cobblemon.red_card.tooltip_1: Monsters that damage th' wielder are forced t' swap out
item.cobblemon.ring_target.tooltip: Th' wielder can be hit by all elements
item.cobblemon.rocky_helmet.tooltip: Makes monsters that make contact with th' wielder to take damage
item.cobblemon.room_service.tooltip_1: Reduces th' wielder's speed if twist'd deck be active
item.cobblemon.scope_lens.tooltip: Boosts th' critical chance for th' wielder
item.cobblemon.sharp_beak.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's soarer element skills
item.cobblemon.soft_sand.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's land element skills
item.cobblemon.spell_tag.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's spirit element skills
item.cobblemon.twisted_spoon.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's mental element skills
item.cobblemon.psychic_seed.tooltip: Increases th' wielder's strength on mental island
advancements.cobblemon.place_campfire_po: Place a pot o' campin' on a lit campfire
advancements.cobblemon.use_iv_candy.desc: Use a candy that alters a monster's ivs
item.cobblemon.dragon_scale.tooltip: Transmogrifies Seadra ta' Kingdra if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.kings_rock.tooltip_2: Transmogrifies Poliwhirl ta' Politoed 'nd Slowpoke ta' Slowking if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.metal_coat.tooltip_1: Increases th' wielder's metal element skills
item.cobblemon.metal_coat.tooltip_2: Transmogrifies Onix ta' Steelix 'nd Scyther ta' Scizor if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.upgrade.tooltip: Transmogrifies Porygon ta' Porygon2 if held when barter'd
item.cobblemon.deep_sea_scale.tooltip_2: Transmogrifies Clamperl ta' Gorebyss if held when barter'd

cobblemon.snapshots.warning.title: Cobbl'd ship version warnin'
cobblemon.snapshots.warning.description: Ye be usin' %s snapshot o' cobblemon. It still be und'r construction, meanin' it may not be safe fer yer seas. Knowing this, would we like t' still proceed?
